newsitem.title: UK: ROWING-SWEDEN'S BRANDIN CRUISES IN TO FINAL.
newsitem.headline: ROWING-SWEDEN'S BRANDIN CRUISES IN TO FINAL.

text.p: World champion Maria Brandin of Sweden advanced to the final of the women's sculls at the Henley Royal Regatta on Saturday with an easy victory over Briton Bronwyn Roye.
Brandin, who won the same race here last year, moved comfortably through her semifinal and will meet British international Guin Batten in Sunday's final.
The Swedish rower clocked a time of eight minutes and 21 seconds, while Batten won her race in a time four seconds slower.
British international Greg Searle faces compatriot and three times world lightweight sculling champion Peter Haining, having seen off a challenge by American Jamie Koven in the men's event.
